summary: As a Child Mariale witnesses her father kill her mother. Years later, she spends her life with little contact from the outside world living in a gloomy castle. One day, however Mariale ... See full summary »
cast: Evelyn Stewart|Luigi Pistilli|Ivan Rassimov|Pilar Velázquez|Edilio Kim|Gengher Gatti|Giancarlo Bonuglia|Gianni Dei|Ezio Marano|Shawn Robinson|Franco Calogero|Carla Mancini|Bruno Boschetti
title: La orgía de la sangre
